name: Total Phosphorus - Forests and Drift Plains
shortName: Total Phosphorus - Forests and Drift Plains
functionStatement: Nitrogen and phosphorus inputs and transformations support productivity without causing eutrophication or nuisance growth.
descriptionMarkdown: Nutrient concentration or bioindicator of nutrient enrichment affecting productivity and eutrophication risk.
methodContextMarkdown:
Context: Channel

Method: Field (sampling) and/or Desktop (data compilation)
howToMeasureMarkdown: Collect and analyze TN/TP (or compute diatom-based nutrient index) for the reach and compare to SQT thresholds, accounting for stratified region classes.

inputs.label: Total Phosphorus - Forests and Drift Plains
inputs.helpMarkdown: Laboratory nutrient analysis (grab/automated samples) and/or bioindicator index outputs (e.g., diatom indices).

references: EPA Water Quality Portal nutrient data where available
diatom index calculation references where applicable
